sub_title: International law - Human rights law -Environmental law -Transitional justice
summary: Experienced Colombian lawyer adept at conducting thorough legal research and analysis, with specialized expertise in international law, transitional justice, and conflict resolution. Proficient in driving forward judicial processes and crafting legal documentation, encompassing constitutional law, international human rights law, international criminal law, and strategic environmental litigation. Eager to contribute to human rights research and advocacy, fueled by a keen passion for the intersection of public policies, environmental law, and conflict resolution.
